ValidationRule.description: In order to move to Closed Won, a user must move through Send EA Link first.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $User.Bypass_Validation__c = false,
left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester , 15),
ISCHANGED(StageName),
AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Send EA Link')), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won') )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must move this Opportunity through the Send EA Link stage before moving to Closed Won.
